naslov: BRAČ // Postira, APARTMANSKA KUĆA / LOKACIJA-POGLED /video -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. Video You tube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wp7w1-kuYg&t=6s + NAPOMENA: detaljni video svih apartmana i slike šaljemo na upit LOKACIJA: https://www.google.com/maps/place/43%C2%B022'21.8%22N+16%C2%B038'18.2%22E/@43.3727188,16.6358013,610m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d43.3727188!4d16.6383762?entry=ttu Prodaja apartmanske kuće u Postiri na otoku Braču predstavlja izvanrednu priliku za one koji traže mirno utočište uz more ili žele investirati u turistički sektor. Smještena na samo 200 metara od šljunčane plaže, ova kuća nudi ne samo blizinu mora, već i panoramski pogled koji se pruža iz svakog kutka objekta. Sa četiri već uređena apartmana i potencijalom za peti, pruža se mogućnost za razvoj poslovanja ili stvaranje obiteljskog ljetnikovca. Okružena mediteranskim biljem, kuća nudi autentično iskustvo Dalmacije, dok privatni parking i prostor za bazen dodatno povećavaju njezinu vrijednost. Bilo da je riječ o privatnom odmoru ili poslovnom poduhvatu, ova kuća u Postiri je pravi dragulj koji čeka svog novog vlasnika. TEHNIČKI OPIS: - gradnja 70-tih godina / zadnja adaptacija 2019.godine (kuća se svake godine održava i dodatno uređuje) - stambeno cca 250m2 + terase // parcela 401m2 + parking 200m2 - PRIZEMLJE: konoba / apartman (neuređena) - 1.kat: dvosoban i jednosoban apartman - 2.kat: 2 x jednosoban apartman - 2.ulaza na parcelu / donji ulaz ima direktni prilaz do plaže autom (cca 200metara) - parcela pogodna za izgradnju bazena sa terasama ENG --------------------------------------- - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. You tube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wp7w1-kuYg&t=6s + NOTE: we send a detailed video of all apartments and pictures on request LOCATION: https://www.google.com/maps/place/43%C2%B022'21.8%22N+16%C2%B038'18.2%22E/@43.3727188,16.6358013,610m/data=!3m1!1e3! 4m4!3m3!8m2!3d43.3727188!4d16.6383762?entry=ttu The sale of an apartment house in Postira on the island of Brač represents an extraordinary opportunity for those who are looking for a peaceful haven by the sea or want to invest in the tourism sector. Located just 200 meters from the pebble beach, this house offers not only proximity to the sea, but also a panoramic view from every corner of the property. With four already decorated apartments and the potential for a fifth, there is an opportunity to develop a business or create a family summer house. Surrounded by Mediterranean plants, the house offers an authentic Dalmatian experience, while private parking and a pool area further increase its value. Whether it's a private vacation or a business venture, this house in Postira is a real gem waiting for its new owner. TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: - construction in the 1970s / last renovation in 2019 (the house is maintained and additionally decorated every year) - residential approx. 250m2 + terraces // plot 401m2 + parking 200m2 - GROUND FLOOR: tavern / apartment (unfurnished) - 1st floor: two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartment - 2nd floor: 2 x one-room apartments - 2nd entrance to the plot / lower entrance has direct access to the beach by car (approx. 200 meters) - a plot of land suitable for building a swimming pool with terraces #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
